params.lastUpdatedTimestamp: the last updated time for strategy
params.strategy: the strategy to accrue rewards for

returns.amount: the amount of tokens accrued and transferred

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.rewards: the rewards info for the strategy
params.strategy: the strategy to accrue rewards for

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

FlywheelError().notice: thrown when caller is not the flywheel

getAccruedRewards(address,uint32).notice: calculate and transfer accrued rewards to flywheel core

setRewardsInfo(address,(uint224,uint32)).notice: set rewards per second and rewards end time for Fei Rewards

userdoc.notice: Determines rewards per strategy based on a fixed reward rate per second
